definition: seedling/young plant

sentences.english: The garden was planted with Chinese roses.
The farmers are bedding up for planting seedlings.
sentences.chinese: 農民們爲栽秧苗翻地作壟。

sentences.english: They planted a stake in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 他們在地上栽了一根木樁。

sentences.english: It will be an ideal rice transplanting machine at present.
sentences.chinese: 水稻鉢苗行栽機是目前較爲理想的一種水稻移栽機械。
不能吹倒神所栽的樹木。

sentences.english: Aunt says that a process, I do not planted it , and let it suck in the.
sentences.chinese: 姨姨則說，早知如此，我就不栽它，任它吸地了。

sentences.english: All in all, acrylon is an acid-base, the best a dyed.
sentences.chinese: 總之，腈綸是一栽耐酸鹼的纖維，最壞一次染成。

sentences.english: Barbara came a cropper when her business failed.
sentences.chinese: 巴巴拉破產了，她栽了個大跟頭。

sentences.english: Residents planted flowers and trees including pine and cypress in the yards.
sentences.chinese: 每座房子都是一二層高，院子裏栽有花草和松柏等。

sentences.english: Those that be planted in the house of the LORD shall flourish in the courts of our God.
sentences.chinese: 他們栽於耶和華的殿中，發旺在我們神的院裏。

sentences.english: Tan sits as chairman of both Fortune Tobacco and the new venture.
sentences.chinese: 陳永栽爲福川菸草和新合資公司的主席。

sentences.english: This paper is to introduce Radix Astragali cultivation techniques in the planted ginseng field.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹在栽參後的老參地裏，栽培黃芪的技術。

sentences.english: Why people would like to plant peaches and plums, oranges can also become green and blooming.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼大家只說要栽桃李，難道橘樹就不能碧綠成陰？

sentences.english: The traditional cultivated method of Rehmannia glutinosa is the asexual reproduction that small rhizomes are used as materials of reproduction.
sentences.chinese: 地黃傳統種植方法是用小生地作種栽，進行無性繁殖。

sentences.english: He carefully earthed up the roots of the newly-planted tree.
sentences.chinese: 他細心地在新栽的樹的根部培上土。

sentences.english: The farmer bedded the seedlings in.
sentences.chinese: 農民把秧苗栽在苗圃裏。
